cricket.t20season_note:
Please note: teams will have a wildcard during Gameweek 1, 3 transfers during Gameweek 2, a wildcard during Gameweek 3, and only captain changes during Gameweek 4.
For full rules see [here](https://fanteam.blog/2021/10/06/t20-season-long-world-cup-fantasy-cricket-now-available-on-fanteam/)
